ingredients.ingredient: 1 head fresh broccoli, cut into florets
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cut broccoli florets into uniform sizes for even cooking
Toss broccoli halfway through cooking to ensure even browning and prevent burning
Don't overcrowd the basket; give florets space for air circulation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to cut fresh broccoli into uniform florets, coat with olive oil and seasoning, and air fry until crispy and tender with caramelized edges.
